sentence.Network_en: Amphotericin B in liposome revealed fine stability.
sentence.Network_cn: 两性霉素B在脂质体中具有优良的稳定性.

sentence.Network_en: Results Amphotericin B is a potent antifungal agent with a broad antifungal spectrum.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果两性霉素B是抗菌谱广、抗菌作用强的抗真菌药物.

sentence.Network_en: In conclusion, treatment with amphotericin B and itraconazole has negligible efficacy in CNS aspergillosis.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论:联用两性霉素B和伊曲康唑治疗CNS曲霉病无明显疗效.
